subject: Missing USB cable in order #SSN3601
description_text:
Hi Simsonn Support Team,

I received my order #SSN3601 today (Simsonn pedals), and I noticed that the
USB cable was missing from the package.

The packaging and documentation indicate that a USB cable should be
included, but it wasn’t in the box.

Could you please arrange to send me the missing USB cable, or let me know
how this can be resolved?

Thank you for your help.

Kind regards,
Ali

[image: emailAddress] ali.saeedinia@gmail.com

conversations.body_text: Hi Ali Saeedinia, We will send you a replacement USB cable tomorrow.

Thank you for your assistance.


On Wed, 26 Nov 2025 at 9:32 pm, service@simsonn.com
